sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ShadowTaskImpl</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.ShadowTaskImpl
Extension point for PostEngineHandlers.</description>
        <name>ShadowTaskImpl</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ShadowTaskImpl = Class.create();
ShadowTaskImpl.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    process: function(topTaskId, jsonData, taskStartDate, previousGr, tableName, currentGr) {
		if ( PPMTableCheck.isProject(tableName) || PPMTableCheck.isProjectTask(tableName)) {
			
			if (currentGr && currentGr.operation() == 'delete')
				return;
			
		    var shadowTaskSync = new ShadowTaskSync();
			shadowTaskSync.process(topTaskId, jsonData, taskStartDate, previousGr);
			var shadowTaskHandler = new ShadowTaskHandler();
			shadowTaskHandler.process(topTaskId, jsonData, taskStartDate, previousGr);
		}
		
    },

    type: 'ShadowTaskImpl'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-16 06:35:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>91ad607387812300b6f8578c87cb0b15</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ShadowTaskImpl</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_91ad607387812300b6f8578c87cb0b15</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-30 07:00:02</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>657</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
